basics.name: Silvia Arjona Garcia
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S in Astrophysics and a B.A. in Computer Science in the College of Natural Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.summary: Work with children ages 4-18 on different levels of math
highlights: Collaborate with other instructors to optimize teaching

work.summary: Worked as a sales associate at Quiksilver in Honolulu
highlights: Attend to customer's needs and questions
Making sure space was clean and organized

volunteer.organization: University of Hawaii Society of Physics Students
highlights: Attending outreach services to the campus and local communities
Attend lunches with professors and stargazing nights

volunteer.summary: Member of the premier choral group at UH
highlights: Perform at several concerts at various venues throughout the semester

awards.title: Dean's List Fall 2024
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction when they earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more and do not receive grades of NC (no credit), W (withdrawn), I (incomplete), F (failure).
